mapper.select: SELECT FROM vehicles WHERE driver_id = #{driverId} ORDER BY is_active DESC, created_at DESC
SELECT FROM vehicles WHERE driver_id = #{driverId} AND is_active = TRUE LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE vehicles SET is_active = CASE WHEN id = #{vehicleId} THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE driver_id = #{driverId}
mapper.select: SELECT v.id, v.driver_id as driverId, v.plate_number as plateNumber, v.brand, v.model, v.color, v.vehicle_type as vehicleType, v.vehicle_image as vehicleImage, v.status, v.is_active as isActive, v.created_at as createdAt, v.updated_at as updatedAt, d.id as driverTableId, u.id as driverUserId, u.real_name as driverName, u.phone as driverPhone, u.avatar as driverAvatar FROM vehicles v LEFT JOIN drivers d ON v.driver_id = d.id LEFT JOIN users u ON d.user_id = u.id ORDER BY v.created_at DESC
